text: Deyakyy z nykh zavdayutʹ bilʹ proroku kazhuchy, "Vin ye vsi vushra!" Skazhitʹ, "Tse ye krashche dlya vas shcho vin slukhaye vas. Vin virytʹ v BOHU, ta doviryaye viruyucham. Vin ye myloserdya dlya ts sered vas shcho vvazhayete." Tsey khto zavdavaly bilʹ BOZHOMU kur'yeru zaznaly bolisnoho retribution
